nodes.text: TC-3 was a TC-series protocol droid belonging to Senator Yeb Yeb Adem'thorn.
TC-3 had primarily red plating with silver colored seams. He was distinguished by a silver neck, which almost gave the appearance that his red-colored head was floating.
TC-3 was cut from The Phantom Menace. Star Wars Episode I: I Am a Droid indicates that TC-3 was an early name for TC-14.
